tool.name: odgi build
tool.description: construct a dynamic succinct variation graph
tool.command: cp '$gfa' input.gfa && odgi build -g input.gfa -o '$odgi_output' $sort #if $to_gfa && odgi view -i '$odgi_output' $to_gfa > '$gfa_output' #end if

param.label: Construct the graph from this GFA input file
Topological sort the graph
param.help: Apply generalized topological sort to the graph and set node ids to order.

tool.help:
@HELP_HEADER@
`odgi build` converts a GFA file into an ODGI graph, optionally topologically sorting nodes and emitting a companion GFA view.
### Inputs
- **Construct the graph from this GFA input file**: Source GFA file to ingest. - **Topological sort the graph**: Apply generalized topological sorting before writing the `.og`. - **Output additional GFA file**: Re-export the resulting graph in GFA format.
### Outputs
- **odgi**: The constructed graph in ODGI format. - **GFA**: Optional GFA view of the constructed graph.
